proposals.title: Add 'overwhelmed' to emotional reaction vocabulary
proposals.description: Propose adding 'overwhelmed' as an option in emotional reactions for content, to capture when material is too complex or heavy without negative judgment.
proposals.rationale: Sometimes content is valuable but emotionally heavy. Having a non-judgmental way to signal this helps both learners and content curators.

proposals.title: Require attestation for assessment access
proposals.description: Propose that sensitive self-knowledge assessments (attachment, trauma) require completing a preparatory path first.
proposals.rationale: Some assessments can surface difficult emotions. A preparatory path ensures learners have context and support resources.

amendments.description: Exception for licensed mental health professionals

proposals.title: Ratify Economic Coordination Epic
proposals.description: Formally ratify the Economic Coordination Epic as canonical protocol documentation.

outcome.reasoning: Unanimous support from voting members. Epic properly documents REA integration.
